structure.unit: General Provisions Relative To State Departments, Commissions, Officers And Employees

law.catch_line: Public Officers Appointed By Governor; Removal
law.text: Unless some other mode of removal is provided by law, a public officer, if appointed by the governor, may at any time be removed by him for cause, and, if appointed by him with the advice and consent of the council, may be so removed with its advice and consent.
